Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Washington in 2009...
Injured on 6/30/2009 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Traded from Washington to Cincinnati on 1/31/2011 (Going to WSH: 3B M. Giles, LF T. Long, P B. Corey. Going to CIN: CF D. Tate, P J. Lewis)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/10/2014, off Jered Weaver (HOU)...
Injured on 7/9/2015 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/12/2019 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Philadelphia on 8/31/2020...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Injured on 4/10/2022 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 4/25/2023 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
